dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The new Kazakhstan Media Center in Almaty is projected to cost 22.2 billion tenge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The new Kazakhstan Media Center in Almaty is projected to cost twenty two point two billion tenge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The total cost of the project is estimated at 22.2 billion tenge, with 93.3 percent funded by the city budget.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and almost all of that, like 93 percent, is coming from the city budget, which is uh, a huge investment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and almost all of that, like ninety three percent, is coming from the city budget, which is uh, a huge investment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The total cost of the project is estimated at 22.2 billion tenge, with 93.3 percent funded by the city budget.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and it's supposed to replace the building that was destroyed back in January 2022 during the unrest.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and it's supposed to replace the building that was destroyed back in January twenty twenty two during the unrest.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Authorities in Almaty have revealed the design of the new Kazakhstan Media Center, which is set to replace the building destroyed during the January unrest of 2022.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Governor Erbolat Dossaev presented the plans to the president, didn't he?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Governor Erbolat Dossaev presented the plans to the president, didn't he?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to a document presented by Almaty Akim (governor), Erbolat Dossaev, to the President, construction is expected to be completed by December 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And they're aiming for completion by December 2025—that's a pretty tight timeline for such a major project.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And they're aiming for completion by December twenty twenty five-that's a pretty tight timeline for such a major project.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to a document presented by Almaty Akim (governor), Erbolat Dossaev, to the President, construction is expected to be completed by December 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It sounds like it'll be really modern though. They mentioned television studios, sound stages, editing rooms…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It sounds like it'll be really modern though. They mentioned television studios, sound stages, editing rooms...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The new facility will be equipped with modern television studios, sound stages, video editing rooms, and conference spaces, the city's construction department said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Conference spaces too. It's clearly designed to be a hub for media production, not just broadcasting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Conference spaces too. It's clearly designed to be a hub for media production, not just broadcasting.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The new facility will be equipped with modern television studios, sound stages, video editing rooms, and conference spaces, the city's construction department said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they're emphasizing international standards, which makes sense if they want to produce content that competes globally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're emphasizing international standards, which makes sense if they want to produce content that competes globally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Officials noted that the building will meet international standards, enabling the production of television and film content, as well as the development of digital media formats.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Do you think this is part of a bigger push to develop Almaty as a media capital?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do you think this is part of a bigger push to develop Almaty as a media capital?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, definitely. Especially with the earlier news about the stadium reconstruction—seems like the city is investing heavily in infrastructure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, definitely. Especially with the earlier news about the stadium reconstruction-seems like the city is investing heavily in infrastructure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Erbolat Dossaev announced that the Almaty Central Stadium will have a record capacity after reconstruction.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: I wonder how local media professionals feel about it. New facilities could really boost production quality.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I wonder how local media professionals feel about it. New facilities could really boost production quality.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And with digital media formats included, it's not just traditional TV—they're thinking ahead.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And with digital media formats included, it's not just traditional T V-they're thinking ahead.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Officials noted that the building will meet international standards, enabling the production of television and film content, as well as the development of digital media formats.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Let's hope the timeline holds. Construction projects like this can sometimes face delays.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Let's hope the timeline holds. Construction projects like this can sometimes face delays.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True, but if they pull it off, it could be a real landmark for Almaty.
